description: Consider Fibonacci-type sequences b(0)=X, b(1)=Y, b(k)=b(k-1)+b(k-2) mod n; all are periodic; sequence gives minimal nontrivial period length.
comments: The maximal nontrivial period lengths are the Pisano periods, sequence A001175. - Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jan 06 2005
author: _Phil Carmody_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jan 06 2005
